Description: Fragment of Attic black-glazed pottery cup or bowl foot and floor; tall ring foot; fine red-brown clay with some calcite inclusions. Inscribed under foot. Some light pre-firing grooving and possible red dipinto under foot.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of the Dioskouroi (Naukratis), Found in the area between the sanctuaries of the Dioskouroi and Apollo (see Petrie 1886, 16)
Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Apollo (Naukratis), Found in the area between the sanctuaries of the Dioskouroi and Apollo (see Petrie 1886, 16)
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXV, no. 697)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (ID.051)
